name: Fresh Seafood Platter
description: A delightful selection of the freshest catches from the Mediterranean, including prawns, mussels, and local fish, prepared with traditional coastal flavors.

name: Grilled Sea Bass
description: Locally caught sea bass grilled to perfection with olive oil, garlic, and herbs. A classic Costa Brava dish that highlights the natural flavors of the sea.

name: Mediterranean Paella
description: Traditional Catalan rice dish cooked with seafood, saffron, and seasonal vegetables. A must-try specialty that captures the essence of Mediterranean cuisine.

name: Catalan Tapas Selection
description: An assortment of traditional tapas including pa amb tomàquet, local cheeses, cured meats, and olives. Perfect for sharing and experiencing authentic flavors.

name: Black Rice with Squid
description: Aromatic rice dish colored with squid ink, featuring tender pieces of squid and aioli. A regional favorite known for its bold, savory taste.

name: Suquet de Peix
description: Traditional fisherman's stew with a rich tomato and almond sauce, featuring a variety of local fish and shellfish. A hearty, comforting dish full of flavor.

name: Crema Catalana
description: The iconic Catalan dessert with a rich custard base topped with caramelized sugar. Similar to crème brûlée but with distinctive citrus and cinnamon notes.

name: Local Wine & Cheese
description: A curated selection of regional wines from Empordà paired with artisanal local cheeses. Experience the perfect harmony of flavors from the region.
